121.title: Rain or others?

122.content:
December Future Century 60. After 11 months of intense fighting across the globe, those who had survived gathered in Neo-Hong Kong for the final battle and a chance at grasping glory for their colony. One such champion was Neo-Sweden's Allenby Beardsley, though she had little interest in glory. Orphaned as a child, the young woman had been taken in and raised by Neo-Sweden's military in the hopes of grooming her into a champion Gundam Fighter by any means necessary. Regular tests and training had molded Allenby into a nearly undefeatble warrior. Although only 17, she was one of the most dangerous humans alive. Perhaps her only weakness was her loneliness. Allenby, like any normal person, had never imagined this sort of life for herself. She received no love from the military and was treated as little better than spare parts. Perhaps the closest thing she had to a friend was Professor Behluima. Even that was little comfort as the man was responsible for the Berzerker System, a brainwashing control system that turned Allenby into a raging beast for quick wins and fights. Her luck had changed though recently. She'd become friends with Domon Kasshu, one of the mightiest competitors in this year's fight and current holder of the King of Hearts title. Through him, she'd also come into contact with his 4 Shuffle Alliance allies and Rain Mikamura, Domon's female assistant. Rain occasionaly showed a dislike for Allenby, as if she was worried the younger girl was going to drag Domon away from her. Allenby would privately admit she was at least a bit smitten with Domon, though wished Rain no ill....though she had occasionly wondered what would happen if Rain wasn't a factor...

For Allenby, it was just another day. She had no fights scheduled for that day so the scientists, as usual, had decided to use the time to test new theories for increasing Allenby's performance. The first on the agenda was a radical growth hormone injection. Neo-Sweden's team had noted that at least three of the competitors in this years finals- Neo-Russia, Neo-Canada, and Neo-Greece, boasted superiour muscular structure. Allenby had already managed to defeat Neo-Russia thanks to her Berzerker System, but the team weren't taking any chances. Allenby wasn't weak but the strength of the three highlighted competitors was beyond human. To combat this, the scientists had created an advanced growth hormone which would be fed into Allenby during combat, greatly increasing her muscles.

Allenby stood in a center of a lab, clad in her blue, red and white Mobile Trace suit. The body tight suit showed off her body to great effect. Had Allenby lived a normal life, she'd have no trouble finding a boyfriend. Injected into her body at various places were a series of transparent tubes, designed to feed the hormones into her. She sighed "I wonder what Domon's doing..."
"Begin the test!" shouted the lead scientist, a rather cold and uncaring man Allenby greatly despised. The order was followed by the clattering of keyboards and Allenby watched as the fluid travelled through the tubes to her awaiting body. She winced as she felt the fluid begin to enter her system.
Results showed quickly. Allenby screamed as the muscles of her body swelled, further accenting her already stunning body. Despite the girls pain, the scientists appeared overjoyed- their theory was apparently a success.

But then, something went wrong

Allenby's body shot up in size, the muscles appearing to vanish as the rest of her body caught up to this unnatural factor. She slowly returned to how she looked before the experiment, only several times larger and still growing. Her MT suit was luckily managing to keep up with the growth due it's stretchiness. Some of the scientists started to run off in fear as Allenby's growth started to stop at a height of...
122.title: Allenby's misfortune

choices: The scientists try to stop Allenby. Scientific testing is needed.
Allenby swiftly leaves, heading to the store.
Clothes? To the arcade to relieve some pent-up fighting stress!
1221.content:
Allenby's growth halted at a size of fifteen feet. The straps on the table snapped just before the climax, as Allenby collapsed to the floor. The pain was immense, and her nerves still throbbed with massive amounts of tingling all over. Gasping for breath, the more curious scientists began doing bodily tests on her, measuring her pupil dilation, trying to return her to a state of complete consciousness. Within a few moments, Allenby began to open her eyes, looking around to the world around her.

"What... Why... Hey, you're smaller, what.." She began, as a headache whiplash came into effect.

"She seems okay, but she can't pilot a gundam like this. Get to work on finding out what happened," The lead scientist said, ignoring the girl.

"What do you mean I can't pilot," she said, sitting up. Vertigo began to settle in, as she slouched back against the table. She nearly was as tall as they were, but sitting?

"Reverse it, do something. I don't want excuses, I want results," he continued.

"Reverse what?" Allenby asked, finally standing up. Then it all clicked, noticing how tiny everyone was. She wasn't entirely stupid to think that the world had all shrunk equally. She was fifteen feet tall, although she'd just roughly guess this. A sense of freedom, liberation, began to sweep over her. Not from some inbred desire to be powerful, or some goddess, but instead, she was no longer their plaything. "I guess I can't pilot a gundam like this. I'm going to the arcade."

Several scientists began to lobby their protest, stating quite numerically a list of reasons involving public relations, unknown side effects, potential mishaps, public frenzy, the fact she was still only wearing her MT suit...

"Thanks for bringing that up. I'm sure I can find a long dress that'll do nicely for a skirt somewhere," she said, preparing to leave the room. "Then i can show Domon!"
1221.title: 15ft tall

choices: Allenby goes out to find Domon
Allenby asks one of the scientists what went wrong
1222.content:
Allenby watched as her body continued to grow in size (her suit keeping up as well), looking more than a little frightened by the shocked faces of the scientists around her, several of which left the lab as soon as something other than her muscles were growing. Her head soon enough brushed the ceiling, forcing her to sit down on the ground and curl up her knees as her growth finally stopped at a staggering 40 feet.

The giantess pilot was simply floored by this recent endeavor. Despite the pain she felt from growing, it did feel somewhat nice to see these results. She then examined the lab all around her, which didn't look quite so big anymore..and it was a pretty big lab! Even at this moment in time Allenby still thought about Domon...but also, at the same time, about her duties as a Gundam pilot as well. But what good would a Gundam do to her now? She was several times way too big to fit into hers; heck, if she were to grow some more, she would be strong enough to fight without any weapons at all! It's possible that she could grow to make any Gundam look downright puny in comparison.

"Well, I'm not going to get much done here", Allenby said to herself as she punched out one of the walls around the lab, slowly making her way to the hallway and beyond, hoping that she wouldn't grow any more until she at least got outside. The reactions she got from other people in the building were priceless, a few even making her smile at their expressions. Maybe being big wouldn't be so bad after all..
1222.title: Not so bad..?

choices: Allenby gets worried about her taller stature
Allenby gets exited about her taller stature
12222.content:
Still bewildered by the events that had happened to her, Allenby attempted to find one of the scientists that made her the size she was now. They told her that her muscles would grow, but they didn't mention any possible side effects, much less growing to the size of a giantess. It sure didn't help that many of them were either running away from her or were speechless as she kept looking for someone to talk to, feeling very frustrated at her inability to talk to someone.

"Looks like I'm going to do this the hard way", Allenby told herself as she grabbed a near-by scientist by force and lifted him up straight to her eye level.

"Okay, what's going on? Why am I so big?!" she demanded of the man.

"W-well...you see..", he began, fearful of the 45 foot giantess in front of him. "In the beginning we simply wanted to increase your muscle and perhaps your height by a few inches. Maybe to, say, 6 feet or so. But somehow we were a little off with the calibrations during the testing process."

"A little!?" Allenby fumed. "I'm 45 feet tall! 8 feet would be a little; this is humongous! I assume you know of a way to fix it?"

"Not at the current moment. But we're soon going to start finding a cure for your gigantic size.."

"And how long will that take!?"

"Um....a few months, a year, several years...who knows."

"What!? You have to be kidding m...!"

Before Allenby could continue talking to the man, she started shooting up high in the air once more, now at the 70 foot mark. Once again her suit keeping up with her growth, Allenby found an already cramped room now impossible just to sit down in (even with her whole body wrapped up), and soon enough found herself smashing her way to the outside world. When she finally did get out, stand up, and brushed herself off, the already tall giantess was now an amazing 90 feet tall!
12222.title: More bad news

131.content:
Birds chirped and the sun shone brightly on the Sank Kingdom. Through a window of the central palace, the acting monarch Relena Peacecraft took in the breathtaking view. It had be a dramatic year for the girl, bringing a wave of confusion and sadness and ultimately sweeping her to this destination. Finely discovering her birthrite, Relena had chosen to rebuild the once destroyed kingdom and make it a beacon of peace in a chaotic era. But this was not easily done...the drums of war cried loudly and each day, she knew that war may eventually arrive on their doorstep...

She was shaken from her thoughts by a knock on the door. "Come in". The door was opened, revealing Lucrezia Noin, Relena's acting advisor. "Princess Relena", she bowed before continuing, "I bring a report of the highest urgency..."

Fifteen minutes later, the pair stood in a secret hangar gazing at a mysterious machine, being worked by a small team of mechanics. "What in the world is this?" asked Relena. "We're not sure", replied Noin, "One of my scouting teams claimed it from a Romafeller convoy quite close to our border". "A scouting team?" questioned Relena, alarmed, "Ms Noin, are you engaging in combat within our very own borders?" "I fully understand your misgivings, Princess Relena, but please note this is simply a small defence team I have mustered to keep us safe. The world is at war and not everyone is as open to words of peace as us". Relena frowned and lowered her head. Noin's worlds held an uncomfortable truth. Despite their best efforts, were they just fooling themselves that peace could be obtained?

Relena walked a path around the mysterious machine. An unwelcome shape gazed back at her "This looks like a cannon...". Suddenly, a rising hum filled the air. "WATCH OUT!", yelled a mechanic, "I think I've activated its pow-". He was cut off as a blast of green light shot out and engulfed Relena.

Noin watched in terror. "PRINCESS!!"

As quickly as it came, the light vanished. Relena was still where she had previously stood and showed no physical damage, but quickly fainted. Noin dived in and grabbed the girl before she hit the ground. She looked Relena over with concern, before turning around to the machine. "WHAT THE HELL DO YOU THINK YOU'RE DOING?!" "S-sorry, ma'am", stammered the mechanic, "It was-". "Save it", Noin fumed, "Luckily for us all it seems to have caused little harm to the princess" *Thank God*, she thought to herself, *Zechs would never forgive me if I let his sister die...*

Calls for a medic were made. though directions were given for him to go to Relena's bedroom. The hangar was still supposed to remain secret and so Noin would make sure the girl was safely delivered back to her room. But suddenly, Relena's eyes opened. "...N-Noin.?...I....what hap...". "Easy now", spoke the lavender haired woman, "There was an accident. Nothing too bad, but we're going to get you checked out" "An...acci..dent....I-". Relena was cut off as her body lurched forward and her pupils constricted. "PRINCESS!!", Noin screamed again, lost as to what was happening. The mysterious machine looked to be a weapon, but what kind? Relena's reaction suggested some kind of poisoning...

But it was what happened next that truely confused Noin- Relena began to grow...

How big does Relena get?
131.title: OZ's secret technology

145.content:
Flay Allster sighed. There was little to fill her days with since being transferred off of the Archangel to the main Earth Alliance base. She'd taken to ocassionly wondering the halls, a minor bit of freedom she had been granted until such time as she could be transported to somewhere safer. She knew some of the officers from her youth as friends of her father...obviously they wished to return the favours he'd done them by looking out for his little girl. Those damn Coordinators! This was all their fault...she'd find some way to make them pay.

Flay was snapped out of her thought by the sound of sparks and rambling. "...polarise the power coupling...amplify the processor...". A mix of curiosity and lack of anything better to do led to Flay looking into the room the noise was coming from. She saw a science officer, tinkering away at something. He hadn't noticed her presence, apparently too involved with his work. "There, that should do it! Watch out, you freaks, things are gonna get nasty for you!". No sooner had his rant ended, he spun around to face Flay "Identify yourself!!". Flay was taken aback but quickly tried to do as ordered "F-Flay Allster..I-I'm-". The stranger cut her off, his face changing to a look of suprised joy "The Allster girl?...PERFECT!". Even though he appeared to be a genuine officer, the man's erratic behaviour was scaring Flay. She thought it best to flee but before she could do that he addressed her again- "You miss your father, don't you?". The words struck her heart like a knife. Although the grief constantly swirlled through her head, no one had really spoken to her about it. Not the Archangel crew nor the Alliance officers who had taken her under their care. To have someone actually ask her about it.....She fell to her knees, her head facing down "Yes".
The officer stepped closer, resting a hand on her shoulder "There there...I know how you must feel. It wasn't long ago those freaks cost me family too...my mother and brother, killed by those abominations from space!". He took his other free hand and raised her head by the chin, his eyes softly piercing hers "But I have invented a way to get revenge. For me, for you...for everyone who was served injustice by those Coordinators....but I need your help".
"M-My help?", Flay responded. "Yes", explained the officer, "since they love those oversized wind up toys made in the image of man so much, I thought "Why not one up them?" Why attack with a giant in the image of a human...when you could create giant humans". He walked back to his desk and picked up the device he had been working on "This machine can make any human being gigantic, easily a match for ZAFT's mobile suits....in theory. Those fools signing the cheques haven't given me the allowances I need to test it as I would wish. That is why I ask for your help, Ms Allster. We are kinderate spirits. We can understand the pain those freaks cause and why they must be wiped out at any cost. You are young and thus your injustice is greater. If you help me and the test works, you will become a juggernaut, easily able to wipe out scores of Coordinators in seconds. Will you help me...please?"
145.title: A chance for vengance

choices: The initial growth safely cuts off
1451.content:
It sounded like crazy talk. A device that makes people giant sized? But if true...Flay considered the possibilities, her near insanity being tempted further. She hated her lack of power. Her inability to save her father. The way the Alliance officers ordered her around. The fact she had had to manipulate a Coordinator instead of being able to do something herself. But if she was a giant, that would all change. No one could order her around or hurt her and she could easily protect whoever she wanted...and the Coordinators would soon be nothing more than dark history.
Flay's eyes met the officers, fierce determination burning in them. "I will do it".
The officer clasped his hands togethor "Thank you, Ms", he sighed wistfully, "The experiment will need to be done here, I'm afraid. Should the other officers see us they will foolishly try and stop us. A mere lab is a small price to pay for justice". He began to set the device up in front of Flay. It resembled a large TV studio camera. "My invention will fire a ray at you, starting the growth proccess. As you are a young lady, I will reassure you your dignity- the device is designed to make clothes grow too. May I say, your choice of outfit is perfect". He referred to the uniform Flay was wearing, the same one she'd had since the started service back on the Archangel. For a military uniform it was rather eye catching, something that had only helped her initial schemes to win over Kira Yamato to repay for his sins.

A few minutes later, the device stood ready. Tension in the air was thick. The rewards should the test work were most tantalising for Flay, but should they fail...well, she hadn't been told.
"Ready?" the officer asked. Flay nodded. "Good luck, Ms Allster". He fired up the machine and a beam of green light headed straight for Flay, covering her in a similar aura. For a few seconds nothing seemed to happen...then it began.

With a steady increase in speed, the world around Flay grew smaller and smaller. What had once been an average teenage girl began consuming more and more space. Flay had been an earlier bloomer and her increasing size only accented the curves which had made the crush of so many on Heliopolis. True to the officer's word, her clothes were keeping up.
As she continued to grow, the room felt the effects- tables and shelves were pushed aside, chairs and smaller items were crushed. Flay felt that clashes but they were next to nothing to her. She could also feel how powerful she was getting...it was perfect!
1451.title: Offer you can't refuse

choices: Dig around for the invention, it may have uses
14512.content:
Flay had now reached the gigantic size of 30ft tall, filling almost all of the lab. "Perfect! That should do for now", spoke the overjoyed officer, "This is wonderful!". He moved to turn the machine off, hinting a switch...a red light began beeping in response. "What? NO! Stupid machine, switch off!". He began trying any number of button combinations. All the while, the ray continued out and Flay continued to grow. She took minor notice of the events, puzzled as to why the growth had not stopped as said but far from unhappy. The man continued to franticly work at the machine, paying her no attention which seemed almost impossible. Was he more concerned about his precious invention then her?....He'd lied. He was no different then all the others. As these thoughts entered her head, she finally met with the limits of the room. Still growing she began to burst through the walls and ceiling, her shapely form plowing through concrete and steel as though it were paper.

This finally drew the attention of the insane officer. He spun around, screeching frantic nonsense. Flay payed him no mind as her growth continued to rock the room. Parts of the ceiling gave way, one burying the officer and his prized invention as Flay finally burst out of the building, her growth now stopped.

What does Flay do?

Fa Yuiry just kicked off one the railings and started floating through the MS hangar of the Argama, soon reaching her destination of the Mobile Suit assigned to her: the Methuss. It was recently equipped with some sort of different version of the Bio Sensor found in the Zeta and just like its', the effects aren't well researched. Getting herself seated, she brings up the dashboard and checks if everything is working properly. "Fa Yuiry, launching !" She exclaimed as she accelerated just as she was being moved across the runway, then being thrown away towards the battle. As she got closer, she noticed that shining purple words were on the dashboard. It read: Bio Sensor 0.83. Activate ? Yes / No. Since her mission was to test the device, Fa pressed the button without much concern. Once the 'Yes' was pressed, the letters disappeared and in place of that, her cockpit was glowing purple ! The light suddenly started shining on the seated Fa, which screamed out of fear and the weirdest sensation in her body, one that could not be explained.

If it was just her body being lit by the glow, it could mean that her body was going to be changed, perhaps enlarged, made invulnerable to the nasty effects of space.

Or, her body and her Mobile Suit could be glowing, meaning that the mobile suit could possibly become her 'armour' if she were to grow very large.

155211.content:
Sumeragi Lee Noriega sat at her desk, her only companions being a large collection of alcohol bottles. The 26 year old strategist was hard at work on planning the next wave of interventions to be undertaken. But something troubled her. Even with the aid of Veda, the quantum super computer at the very heart of Celestial Being, she was having difficulty creating this new strategy. She'd been at it for ages and still no real progress. There had to be something else she could do...

And then she remembered it.


The full virtual reality immersion system was a rarely used part of the Veda system. It had last been used during the training of the four Meisters and at that time had shown slight curiousities. But Ian had been working on it since, so surely by now it would be fine.
Her plan was simple- she could use the system to personally run through her draft with the strategy. Seeing it in action would then allow her to better understand where she was going wrong and eliminate the problem.
From her desk she produced a slim visor, the means of entering the VR system. She was thankful she was allowed this courtesy, not particularly wishing to leave her room at this time. Making herself comfortable on her bunk, she placed the visor on her face and activated it. She began to drift off slightly as the system began...


"Welcome to the Veda System. Please provide Security ID and Password"
"Security ID SUM0079, Password Tequilla"
"Authourisation accepted. Welcome, Sumeragi Lee Noriega. Assigned task?"
"Activate the Intervention Trial Programme and load Intervention Plan 3987. I want to test it"
"Very good, Miss. Loading Intervention Plan 3987. Assigned Gundams: GN-001 Exia, GN-003 Kyrios and....and....and...and..."
Sumeragi was concerned. Not a glitch! This was the last thing she needed...
"and...and....searching.....alternative source found...Continuing to load Intervention Trial Programme"
Suddenly there was a great flash...when it cleared, Sumeragi was in the virtual world. The level of technology was so advance that the world before her was nearly indistinguishable from reality. The landscape, the rush of air...even herself had been recreated perfectly.

She watched as over the horizon Exia and Kyrios appeared. But no Virtue. That was odd, the system had said it had found an alternate source so where was it?...It then struck her that the two Gundams looked different. Not as large as she expected. In fact, everything looked a little small...
That's when it hit her.
The alternate source replacing the gigantic third Gundam....was her!
155211.title: Sumeragi's Simulation

choices: Went to help with the intervention
1552111.content:
"SUM0079 System Override....SUM0079 System Override!"
The familiar system voice chirped a response "System Override Activated. Task?"
"Cancel the simulation, there's an error"
"Scans show no error. All existing parameters have been loaded. System normal"
"Me at King Kong size isn't normal!" she growled in response
"System normal" the computer repeated again.
Sumeragi sighed. "Fine, whatever. Just cancel it"
"Command cannot be processed"
"What?"
"Current process must be completed"
"What?!"
"I am sorry for any inconvenice. If this problem persists, please contact your assigned Veda system administrator"
"WHAT?!"

No response. The stress was unusual. Computer glitches were common three centuries ago but modern technology was far more advanced. Veda was the peak of this, possesing near human interface. To see an element of it behave so poorly...she let out another deep sigh. Sometimes life really seemed to hate her.
She pondered her next step. Despite classifying her as Virtue, the system had merely created her at its height of 60ft tall. Other than that her measurements were her own and she wore her usual blue and white attire. It was an odd feeling, being so big....Oh, sure, she'd been 'big' since her late teens but this was something different. She wondered how her old friend Billy would react if he ever saw her like this, his favourite lady now the size of a mobile suit...she laughed at the idea and then sighed a liitle again. Thankfully none of this was real.

Whilst she had pondered, the two artificial Gundams had reached their target- a military base. She watched as the pair skillfully destroyed all resistance, the system using data logs of the Meister's past battles to determine how they would most likely act. This was a living, breathing world, running exactly like the real one...the one she needed to get back to. The system had told her the only way to achieve that was for the simulation to run its course. If she helped, that would come quickly....but at the same time, her natural desire to procrastinate made her wonder what else she could do here with her new size...

Her mind was up. She began to walk,her massive white high heels making the ground shake with every step as she...
1552111.title: Technical problems

choices: She resolves to fight the Enacts
Sumeragi decides to take the tiny soldier as a hostage
15521111.content:
The sooner the simulation was completed, the sooner she could go home. Unlike the two simulated Gundams, she had the benefit of a working brain. Surely between that and the simulations she could quickly resolve this issue. Her titanic stride quickly enabled her to reach the simulated military base and with a comical cry of "Gundam Sumeragi, Launching!" she lept into the fray.

Unlike the Gundams she lacked weapons, but her sheer size and strength made up for that. She took mighty strides, getting quite into her role. Below, smaller base vehicles swerved to miss her feet as she marched. One barely managed, scraping past her shoe as it swerved. "HEY!" she called down, "Watch the merchandise!"

A few strides away stood the radar tower, one of the key installations necessary to complete the intervention. It would be an easy task to lay into the building and damage it herself. The way was clear, with all the MS seemingly busy fighting the Gundams.

As if on cue, a team of 8 Enacts marched into view and blocked her path "Freeze, Gundam scum!" the enemy commander demanded

Sumeragi sighed. "One way or another, I always suffer for AEU stratagies..." she grimly commented. At least this was just a simulation. A game.

She wondered how 8 Enacts would do against her at this scale. Granted she wasn't really a fighter. Though maybe there was something she could use to even the odds. She looked around for something...something...

That was when her eyes fell on him- a group troop who had seemingly been cut off from his fellow troops. An idea struck her....she had never been keen on the idea of using hostages in war, but as she'd already resolved this was effectively a game. As a tactical forecaster, her resolve was always to find the quickest and cleanest path to success. A little hostage might just be the way...

1552111111.content:
With incredible force, the foot pounded into the metal titan, sending it sprawling to the ground. As the command unit struggled to get back up, its 7 subordinates took to the air. "Smart strategy", mused Sumeragi, "They'd take a pounding on land, but they take the advantage in the air....so what's my next move?". The Enacts weren't going to give her the chance to ponder it- they began swooping in, attacking from various angles like vultures.

"OW! Dammit, this isn't fair!" Although she was use to the pressure of the battlefield, she'd never entered direct combat before. Struggling in the moment left little room to plan a wider strategy. It was effectively cutting off her head to...She paused. That was it! Swiftly, she looked around once again for the commander unit. As luck would have it, it was headed right for her. Perfect.

As the lead unit bore down to attack its opponent, Sumeragi embraced the unit in a mighty hug. The anorexic looking mobile suit lacked the necessary power to break free of the embrace. The commander himself couldn't even plan a counter attack, his viewscreens filled with the largest female chest he'd ever seen.

"Enjoying yourself?", Sumeragi cooed, intentionally flirting like a ditz "I've met some guys who would be very jealous of the position you're in right now. I barely even know you or what you look like. Maybe we should correct that, hm?". Removing one arm from the embrace, she moved the other to the Enact's chest mounted cockpit and began to attempt to pry it open...

15521221.content:
Felt Grace was different from most fourteen year olds. The daughter of deceased Gundam Meister pilots, she had spent her life raised within the highly secretive Celestial Being organization. This extended even to family members, meaning Felt knew little of even her own parents. From what little she did know, she had chosen to continue their legacy as a technical operator. As of 2307, she was stationed on the carrier ship Ptolemaios at the dawn of Celestial Being's global intervention campaign. However, even if Celestial Being was now publically active this did not mean that testing and research was not still being conducted...

Felt proceeded down one of the many narrow corridors of the ship, propelled by a hand rail. She wore her usual casual attire, an odd almost catsuit-like get up with long gloves and boots. Unknown to Felt, she was being watched.

In a far away facility, two shadowy Celestial Being officials watched a security camera feed of Felt from within a lab.
"So this is the subject?"
"Yes, that's her. A daughter of two of our most promising and talented Gundam Meisters. Tests indicate she has the potential to match and possibly exceed her parents in all fields"
"So you assume this would make her a strong candidate for Leviathan?"
"Quite so. She's also been raised within the perfected environment of the organization. A trait the lack of which makes certain other potential candidates less desirable"
"I agree. Even our current Gundam Meisters are showing a questionable lack of clarity. The sooner we can address that setback the better"
"I have your approval, then?"
"As much as needed. Leviathan is needed now more than ever"
"Very well. I shall give the word to our trusted operative..."


Felt reached her destination, the mess hall of the Ptolemaios. It was empty, the rest of the crew either attending to duties or in their quarters. She just taken her meal and sat down when the Gundam Meister Tiera Erde. Much like herself, the androgynous young man seemed to have a long history with Celestial Being though he never spoke of it. When he did speak, his words often isolated the crew of the Ptolemaios and his fellow Meisters.

Oddly for a loner such as Tiera, he sat straight across from her. "Felt Grace", he began in his usual style. "Tiera...", responded Felt, herself not much for talk. "I wish to congratulate you", the purple haired male continued, "Whilst some other operatives are showing such poor performance, you continue to perform all that is asked of you. If more of our operatives mirrored yourself, I have no doubt the plan would be on schedule. Let me thank you".
He stood up and placed a hand on her shoulder, managing to knock over the cup Felt had been drinking from. "Forgive me", he apolagised, mopping up the mess with a serviette, "I'll get you a replacement". Felt remained silent.

Unknown to Felt, the knocking over of her cup had been quite less than accidental. Tiera had planned the whole thing. Off in the corner he spiked the new drink with a green liquid, the work of a Celestial Being project code named Leviathan. The green mixture swirled around briefly, before fading and slipping into the base liquid.

"Here you go", announced Tiera, setting the new drink before Felt. "Please forgive my clumsiness. I'd keep you company but I have a mission report to finish". And with that he slipped away. Felt briefly thought the whold incident quite odd but let it go and returned to her meal. She sipped at the drink, unaware of the serum now working its way into her system....
15521221.title: Subject: F. Grace

choices: Was torn to shreads as she grew out of it.

She finally stumbled into her room, and flopped down on her bed as the dizzy spell reached a new level of intensity, then before she knew it, she suddnly shot up a foot and a half in height. Her uniform.
155212212.title: Of dizzy spells and growth spurts

choices: Wang pursues experiments to make herself grow
Wang pursues experiments to make others shrink
155212221.content:
As head of a noble family with vast wealth, the young socialite had practically anything she might desire. Nature had even gifted her with amazing looks and a cunning mind. But no matter the luxury she enjoyed, it was simply never enough for the young heiress. She always desired more...

Wang's status had led to her being scouted as an agent of the formerly secret Celestial Being. The organization had many such agents, but Wang was one of their most frequent allies. This was partly due to the sheer amount of resources she possessed but also because she wished it to be that way. Amazing though they may be, Celestial Being was nothing more to her than a pawn in the global chess game she was playing to control humanity's future. Armed intervention, Gundams..it was meaningless to her. But one item in particular had a greater use.

The secret to Celestial Being's power were the GN Drives and the GN Particles they produced. The abilities of these particles seemed to be near infinite, though Celestial Being seemed to have little interest in exploring these avenues. Wang Liu-Mei was not so foolish. Whilst it would be impossible to steal one of the five GN Drives at this juncture, the technology existed to save the particles for later use- GN Condensors. The staff of Celestial Being may have consisted of spurned dreamers, but they weren't all noble. In the face of trying to change the whole world, it was a simple matter to bribe a no name technician to fill up a spare Condensor for her use.

That Condensor was now safely stored in her mansion. The key to unlock greater power for herself over the rest of the world. Gundams were one thing, but the possibilities of combining GN Particles with living matter...she had heard scant whispers of the concept.

The question was, which avenue to pursue?
155212221.title: Wang's plot

choices: Grew along with the rest of her.
1552122211.content:
Once the avenue of making herself gorw was choosen, it took months of reasearch, and millions, upon millions of dollars spent, but finally results were here in the form of a spray can. In theory anything sprayed by the particles in the gas, in the can would increase dramatically in size. Liu Mei could wait no long, she needed to test this now.

So there she was, standing in a close-to-town-yet-secluded-enough meadow of flowers. She turned the can towards herself, and gave her body a good, long spray.

At first, she felt nothing, then suddenly she noticed she was getting a gradually higher perspective on things. Her clothes....
1552122211.title: Growth spray!

choices: A young man who started this week as one of her butlers
A maid who has been with her staff for some years
1552122212.content:
Growth experiments were too dangerous at this juncture. Anything enlarged were draw far too much attention, be it the government or Celestial Being themselves. Shrinking technology was much easier to conceal and had less chance of personal danger for herself.

Using her various contacts, Wang was able to rustle up a small team of scientists to work on the technology. Again, her vast wealth ensured they kept quiet on the affair. Besides, if the technology worked it'd be very easy to 'silence' them...

It was some months later that Wang was informed that the tests had been a success. Entering a secret sub basement below her current residence, she was ushered down to a strange chamber. The small team of scientists stood within making final checks. "Mistress!", began the lead scientist, "How honoured I am to inform you of our triumph". "I would expect nothing less", replied Wang, "I have no time for failures". The cutting remark was common of the young lady, a constant reminder of how she viewed herself. "I take it this chamber creates the desired effect?" "Yes, Mistress. The chamber is able to modulate the incredible particles to induce size reduction. We've had perfect success with inanimate objects" He held up his proof- a tiny chair and car (which Wang recognised as one of the many gathering dust in her personal garage). "All that remains is testing on a human subject". "Well now", Wang grinned, "No time like the present" "Mistress?" asked the scientist, somewhat concerned.

With the push of a button the chamber sealed shut, trapping the scientists within. "Mistress, what are you doing?! Wang Liu Mei, answer me!"

Flanked by Hong Long, Wang headed for the control panel. "You were following the development closely?" she asked, already knowing the answer. "Yes, Mistress" replied Hong Long. "Begin activation sequence at maximum". Her bodyguard looked uneasy "Liu Mei-" "I gave you an order. Do as you're told". Hong Long nodded, his momentary spurt of courage quickly ended. The chamber began to glow, an initially green form of light changing instead to white. Through the glass windows that surrounded its edges the form of the scientists quickly diminished downwards until finally fading. Its task done, the chamber switched off.

Wang grinned again. "A complete success".

With the loose ends tied up, it was time to explore the machines usage. Luckily there was no shortage of staff within her service. But who to pick?
1552122212.title: Wang pursues experiments to make others shrink

choices: He tries to run away from the sight of her
1552122221.content:
Seventeen and in the prime of her youth, Louise Halevy studied aerospace engineering overseas with her boyfriend Saji Crossroad. As much as she tries to get him to only pay attention to her, though, she occasionally sees her boyfriend eyeing other girls, which annoyed her greatly and resulted in her pulling his ear whenever he did so. Louise wished there was a way Saji would pay attention to her and only her..

So one day when walking a walk, Louise comes across a stand run by a single guy on the sidewalk. The only item the man was selling were a bunch of bottles with clear liquid in them. They looked more like water bottles than anything else. She picks up one of the bottles and notices some writing on it, which she begins to read out loud:

“Will make you a big target for the person in your life!”

Louise was confused by this. Was it an enhancer of some kind? Whatever it was it didn’t interest her, and she put the bottle back on the table. As she prepared to walk away the man arose from his seat and started shouting to her.

“My lady, that is not SIMPLY a water bottle you held! It can make you grow taller!” Louise seemed intrigued by this and rushed back over. After all, it was the future, a time where people could travel in trains in space in zero-g. Could this truly be something that would make Saji notice her more? She decided to buy one of the bottles and head back to her place. Too excited to wait, she started to drink the bottle’s content and quickly, right in front of the man.

“That was a great drink”, she smiled to the man. “But I don’t feel anything yet..”

“Oh ,you will”, the man said, laughing under his breath. Louise didn’t hear him as she ran back home. As she did, she called Saji and told him to meet her at her living quarters. He reluctantly agreed, not wanting to be chewed out by his girlfriend.

A few minutes later Louise was back home, having enjoyed her walk around the neighborhood. She looked down at her body and didn't notice any differences yet. She then began to sigh. However, as Louise looked at her hands, she felt something strange circulating her entire body. The girl then stood still and started to sweat, wondering if she was coming down with something. She ran quickly to a nearby bathroom and looked at herself in the mirror. As she did her feet and legs were slowly starting to grow, the first part of her body to start growing. The man was right: the bottle's contents WAS making her grow! Scared of her towering height, Louise ran out of the bathroom, accidentally knocking her head on the bathroom ceiling as she did so. By this point her legs were now almost 7 feet long, and both her feet were at least 3 feet long, though the rest of her body had not yet grown in height.

Her next growth happens shortly after leaving the bathroom: her hair. Louise always admired her long, blonde hair, but now it was getting so long Louise couldn't even see since her hair was covering up her face. Her hair grew until it was at least 9 feet long, touching the ground and rolling on it like a carpet. Her next growth was her hands, which grew in three short, but fast, spurts until they were about 6 times their normal height. Her arms then began to grow unwieldy, growing so long and so fast Louise couldn't even see her hands on either arm after they finally stopped growing.

Next was her chest, which grew in spurts of 30 cm a second until they were 6 times their normal height. Her butt was the next thing to grow, growing in the same manner as her chest. Her torso finally grew in height, allowing the girl to fully stand up, as opposed to having to hold on to the wall like she was doing for the last few spurts of growth. Her legs and feet continued to grow then, her legs growing until they were at least 19 or 20 feet in length, and her feet at least 6 feet long. And lastly was her head, which grew in five small spurts until it, like the rest of her body, was at least 6 times its current height.

By the time it was all over Louise was now a little over 30 feet tall and sitting on her legs in an Indian-style manner just to stay in the hallway without cramping her body. She was thankful that no one was around to see her until she saw someone approaching. It was Saji! How should Saji react to his girlfriend’s growth?
1552122221.title: Louise's growth spurt

choices: Saji is able to calm her down
Saji screws up and makes things worse
15521222212.content:
Saji Crossroad was not the most forceful of guys. Although he held clear views on a range of things, he tended to be pretty meek. This was a factor that his girlfriend Louise took proud advantage of. Hailing from Spain, Louise was unlike the more reserved Japanese girls Saji had grown up with. When Louise wanted something, there was little chance she could drop the notion until she'd gotten it.

It was for that reason that he'd headed over to her apartment. He had a ton of papers to write but feared the wrath of his forceful girlfriend if he didn't do as expected.

Louise had entrusted him with the spare key to her living quarters, a rented apartment similar to his own that was jointly funded by the education board and Louise's family. Opening the front door, he entered. "Louise? I'm here"

Entering into the hallway, his eyes were treated to an unexpected sight- a giant, sock-clad foot. A similar appendage was close by, both connected to a pair of equally giant legs. He continued to follow up, seeing an ample chest and a familiar face "Hello, Saji".

The Japanese boy's eyes nearly popped out of his skull. He knew this couldn't be possible but here it was right before him- his girlfriend at gigantic size, clad in her usual attire. Her large frame filled the majority of the apartment.

Acting on basic human instinct, he turned to run. But it was futile. "Saji, you jerk!" bellowed an upset Louise, grabbing her tiny boyfriend by the legs and pulling him towards her. She held Saji before her, her large face wearing a pout that had won her many arguments...
15521222212.title: Foreign girls are taller

Louise's eyes bored into her tiny boyfriend, conveying a mix of sadness and anger. "I can't believe you! How could you try to run off like that?!"

Although she was trying not to apply force, Louise's giant size and anger meant her grip was unintentionally winding Saji. "L-Louise", he sputtered, "What happened?"

"I did this for you, you know!" the upset giantess responded, "I do something special to try and make you notice me and this is how you respond?"

Special was certainly one word for it. Though Saji needed little extra incentive to notice her. Discounting her personality, he certainly found Louise physically attractive. He had to admit that despite the stress she put him through daily, following her was certainly a rewarding sight.
It was then that he took the time to really admire the view before him. If a looker at her normal size, Louise's abnormal growth served only to accent her beauty. Scanning her, his eyes locked onto her chest. Her breasts were large enough at normal scale but now....

Unfortuanetly for Saji, his vision froze for a bit too long. He was snapped out of his day dreaming by a growling noise. Coming to his senses, his head shot up "Louise, I-"

"I try and open my heart to you and all you can do is oggle my chest?! You little pervert!!"

Saji gulped. If the situation was bad, it had just become several times worse. His girlfriend's temper was legendary.

"I'll make you pay, you insensetive jerk! I'm gonna..."

"I'll make you pay, you insensetive jerk! I'm gonna...gonna..." She stopped to think. For Saji, this only increased the tension. A giant and angry girl was a dangerous combination.

Suddenly, Louise focussed on him again, a sly grin creeping across her face. "I'm gonna eat you!". She licked her lips to accent the statement.

"WHAT?!", Saji shrieked, "Louise, you can't do that!"

"Oh yes I can!", she cuttingly replied, "You deserve it for eyeing me up. Besides, I'm a big big girl which means I have a big big appetite" She rubbed her stomach with her free hand "Mmm, and you know how much I enjoy Japanese cuisine, my little boyFOOD"

Saji gulped "Please, Louise! I'm begging you, don't do this! I'm really sorry!!"
1552122221222.title: Saji for dinner?

The giant Louise licked her lips again "Mmmmm, you're going to taste soooo good. I've never eaten a person before. I think you'll make quite the appetizer".

Saji wriggled furiously, trying in vain to escape the vice like grip. "No...NO!"

Louise raised him up slowly towards her mouth. "Through the teeth, past the gums, look out stomach, here he comes!". She drew him towards her gaping maw.

Saji shrieked and closed his eyes....only to hear a laugh. Hesitantly, he opened one eye and than another. Louise was chuckling heartily.

"Louise..."

"You little idiot", the blonde responded, trying to calm down, "I was just joking, silly. I wouldn't eat you...especially not when you're so cute like this!". She hugged her little toy close to her chest. A rush of thoughts passed through Saji's mind, some less pure than others.

"But you know", continued Louise....

"I am actually hungry for something". Her stomach rumbled, loud and somewhat terrifying.

She set him down on the ground. Saji was relieved to be on his own two feet again.

When he returned...,

Saji came home with ten pizzas in his possession, only to find that his already tall girlfriend had shot up in height. Louise was now at least 40 feet tall, and it was a wonder she could fit her large body in the dorm.

"Boy, am I hungry", sighed Louise as she took all 10 pizzas from Saji and gulped them down at once. "Well, that was a pretty good appetizer. But I'm still hungry."

"Louise, you just ate 10 pizzas.."

"Pleeeeeease get me some ice cream", Louise asked Saji with puppy dog eyes, caressing him in her large arms. "It would make me soooo happy if you would." She then pressed Saji on her chest, and the boy could only blush at the feel of her large chest. It was more comfortable than any pillow he's ever laid his head on.

"Alright", he sighed, and with that Louise let the Saji go. Before he left, though, he told her, "Just don't grow again."

"Oh silly, of course I won't", giggled Louise. "Not that I would mind."

And with that, Saji quickly ran to get many a gallon of ice cream for his giantess girlfriend, who felt sleepy after consuming all the pizza, proceeding to fall asleep. When she woke up she found herself..
1552122221222211.title: 40-foot tall girlfriend

choices: Louise spots Seiji, who was walking back to her place
15521222212222112.content:
When Louise woke from her short nap, she tried to stretch her body out like she did every morning when she woke up, but found herself unable to move. The girl sat on her arms while asleep, but now Louise was too tall she couldn't even space out her arms. She had to at least be 50 feet tall now, and was still growing in small spurts even then.

"I'm stuck", an annoyed Louise sighed, trying to move her arms and legs but to no avail. As she tried to move she felt funny again, like she did before when she first grew. Louise noticed the room shrinking ever smaller still, and by that point she had no choice but to smash her way through to the outside. Lousie started kicking the walls of the room in an attempt to move out into the hallway, which she proceeded to do, scooting little by little down the hall. As she did so, she noticed several people closing their doors in horror, leading the girl to sadly sigh as the now 55 foot tall giantess inched her way out of the building.

There was a problem, though: Louise was too big to get out. She could barely fit her arm through the front lobby, much less her body.

"Looks like I have no choice", she sadly sighed to herself as she broke down the front lobby with her arms, making an exit to the outside barely big enough for her to squeeze through. When Louise DID finally get outside, she stood up and stretched her whole body, relieved that she was no longer cramped up inside. She was also now 60 feet talll.

"Where IS Seiji, anyway?" the annoyed giantess asked herself, looking in all directions for the boy, expecting him to be bringing her a butt-load of ice cream. "He should've been back by now." As Louise looked for her boyfriend, the people below her were freaking out, either running into their cars or into other buildings.

"Seiiiiiiji. Where are you?" Louise called out, hoping to spot him.
15521222212222112.title: Running out of space

choices: Take care, these are living people
155212222122221122.content:
There was only one thing for it. If Saji wasn't back yet, she'd simply have to go and find him. It sounded like a simple task, especially given her great height. She sighed. Boys really were useless....well, no matter. Luckily there were big girls like her to take charge!

Her mind made up she set about her task, her large stride causing the ground to rumble slightly. All around her, people ran in continued fear of the giantess. Scouring the landscape for her boyfriend, Louise noticed the ongoing panic as people rushed to put distance between themselves and her.
For her part, Louise was unsure of how to react. Sure, a giant girl was far from normal but people seemed to accept mobile suits easily enough. Yet here the people were, reacting like she was some movie monster. She really didn't know how to react.

What does Louise do?

"Oh, uh, I can believe it" he commented drolly, half guessing what- or who- she was referring to.
"Apparently some kind of giant has appeared in the city. We're not sure if this is from Celestial Being, some escaped Union test- Whatever it is, I need to help find out and can't stop to chat right now"
"WAIT!", cried Saji, recognising when his sister was about to hang up. "I might be able to offer you a, um, big lead"
155212222122221122111.title: Sister, can you help a brother out?

choices: Neena attempts to find her siblings
15521222221.content:
Alejandro Corner sat at his desk, sipping wine as he casually viewed confidential documents on his computer. The first stage of the long planned Corner revolution had proven a great success. He had been able to convince the world that his imitation Gundam Thrones and their Trinity sibling pilots were the next stage in Celestial Being's plan. True, the Thrones were limited by the equally imitation GN Tau Drives but he had made allowances for that. The pilots themselves were perhaps a greater issue. Eldest sibling Johann was more than capable, as well as being loyal to his mistaken belief he had been chosen for Aeolia Schoenberg's plan. But the other two...their manic unpredictability certainly helped to weaken public support for Celestial Being, but was it perhaps too much? Especially the female, Neena..... Alejandro smirked. No, it was impossible for him to miscalculate. He was so close to possesing what generations of the Corner bloodline had long waited for. Perhaps, he mused, there might even be a way to use the Trinity girl's behaviour for a manuver he doubted the intrusive Veda would ever see coming. Widening his grin, he opened a buried file...

In the secret mountain base of the Thrones, a commotion was brewing. "Brotherrrrrr~!" "What is it, Neena?" replied Johann, midly annoyed. "I'm bored! When are we going to get to doooo something?!" "I thought you'd recently complained we were overworked?". An annoyed 'hmph' was all Neena offered in response before turning away. "Don't be so hard on her, bro!" cut in Michael, the manic middle child, "She's got a point". Johann pondered how much Michael actually agreed with her and how much was his sister complex showing. Regardless, it did little to change matters. "I'm sure we'll receive new orders soon".

No sooner had Johann finished, a monitor blinked to life. Striding over, he read the incoming transmission "It's a new mission". "Awesome!", cheered Michael, "I'll go get suited up!" "No", replied Johann, "you're not a part of this mission" "WHAT?! You bastards, since when was I excluded?!" "You're not the only one", continued Johann, "These orders are exclusively for Neena". Hearing her name, the redhead turned around "Me?"

Following the orders, Neena proceeded alone in a distant segment of the base, so far removed she'd had to take a special underground bullet train. The area in question was normally off limits but had been opened to her following the mission briefing. The steps she was taking was in fact all the briefing had requested of her. She hadn't even changed into her pilot suit, still clad in her usual white attire. As she advanced down a long corridor she wondered just what exactly was going on.
The corridor ended in a set of large doors. The metal sheets groaned apart as they registered her pressence. Inside was a gigantic barren room,similar to the hangar the Thrones were kept in but no mobile suits in sight. As she walked to the centre of the room she caught sight of a large glass panel some distance up. Behind it stood the familiar form of Laguna Harvey, head of the siblings operations. For Neena it was all finally too much. "What the hell is going on?!"

"Neena", began Harvey, his voice communicated through a speaker, "I have a most important mission for you". "So you say", responded a still angry Neena, having little time for such cloak and dagger manuvers. "This is a single person mission which requires your unique talents". Neena grinned. Now that she liked the sound of. Although she didn't personally acknowledge it, her vanity was one of her most striking features. "So what do you need me to?" "As you are aware, the Gundams are powered by GN Particles. This miracle power source can serve many roles. Some of these results are less documented than others". His hand moved to a control panel by his side and he flipped a switch. Suddenly, a dome opened in the ceiling above and a large device descended, looking not unlike one of the Gundam's rifles. Before Neena could registed quite what was happening, the device shot a concentrated blast at her.

If it was a beam weapon it didn't incinerate her. The light seemed to fluctuate between a rainbow of particles but keeping one element consistent- GN Particles. Was she being used as a guinea pig?! What the hell WAS going on here?! It didn't take long for an answer. The room was shrinking...no...she was growing!

Laguna Harvey watched the transformation with some shock. As always, his orders had come from Alejandro Corner and he had then passed them on to these disposable soldiers. This most recent order had been largelly vague and now Harvey saw why. Before his eyes Neena Trinity was becoming a collosus, the young woman's form expanding to fill the considerable GN Particle lab. He wasn't sure how this would end but finally gathered enough of his senses to abort the test.

The particle dowsing ended just as Neena reached the height of sixty feet tall. Harvey watched as the girl looked herself over. Was she angry? Thankfully her clothes had grown with her, so surely that would grant him some leeway, Having finished her review, Neena turned towards Harvey and shot a grin which sent a chill up his spine.

"I think I understand the mission, Mr Harvey" and with that she turned and busted out through the wall of the lab, headed for the rest of society. Harvey scrambled for his phone, furiously making an urgent call. "Corner, Corner! She's gone rogue!". To his suprise, Laguna Harvey heard a soft chuckle from the other end of the phone "Perfect..."
15521222221.title: Neena the Titan

choices: A mobilt suit tries to stop her
155212222211.content:
In a nearby city, it was another quiet day. When the lab had originally been constructed, the distance between the two was considered perfectly adequate to put the city outside of the danger zone of any potential fallout from the experiments. Now however...

The ground began shake. Initially the worried citizens assumed it was a quake but this was different. The shaking was more paced, more rythmic. Soon, the true cause became apparent...
"FE FI FO FUM!! I SMELL THE BLOOD OF EVERYONE!!". People screamed and fled in terror as from the horizon advanced the sixty foot tall Neena Trinity, a wide grin transfixed on her face. "Hello, tiny people!" she giggled with manic joy, "BIG Neena's here!". It was a dream come true for her and a nightmare for everybody else. With her trademark pride Neena strode through the streets, not caring who or what got stepped on. The people below were nothing to her, merely worshippers for their new goddess. Oooh, goddess...she liked that. She let out a loud laugh "You can run but you can't hide!"
155212222211.title: Neena's rampage begins

choices: Nena is able to get the proper attention and worship she wants
The crowd refuses, shortening their lifespan to a few seconds in the process
1552122222111.content:
As people and vehicles were turned to paste under the gigantic boots of the cruel Meister, Nena watched as the crowds of tiny people mobbed together and fled from her as soon as they could. In her mind, it was a game they were inviting her to play. See how many tiny people she could catch.

"Oooh, you want to play! I love to play!" she shouted, her voice echoing through the streets as the titaness walked forward, eager to begin her game.

Those that hesitated underneath her were crushed by her idle strides, Nena not even bothering to look back at what she had done. The little people in front of her who actually thought they could flee, they were much more interesting, and much more entertaining.

"Hehe, you move so slow!" she marveled. "I guess you can't resist being away from your goddess, huh?" Nena took all of this in with giggles, failing to realize that they only reason the crowds appeared so slow was because of how much distance her enlarged body could cover in a single stride. Unfortunately for this crowd, the self-declared goddess had soon had enough at merely looking at her toys.

With a speed impossible for the tiny humans on the ground to match, Nena dashed forward, scooping up a few people in one hand and smashing others into bits through her powerful strides. The survivors all fled as quickly as they could, crowding into one area as they attempted to create as much distance between themselves and the giantess as possible.

Unfortunately, this merely played into Nena's hands. With a grin, she moved ahead of the crowd and saw groups of buildings at eye level with her. Smirking, she pushed over the tall but frail structures with her free hand, watching as they fell right into her trap. The crowd, caught between the rubble of the demolished structures and the sixty foot tall redhead, could only look on terrified.

"I win!" Nena announced in a sing-song voice as she approached the crowd. "Since you picked the first game, it's my turn now!"
1552122222111.title: Playtime for the goddess

choices: Someone notices the incident and intervenes
Nena grows bored and decides to finish her games
15521222221111.content:
There was nowhere for the people to go. Nena had the entire city's population at her mercy. But to do something to all of them at once, no, that would be too quick, too easy. She wanted to prolong this. She wanted the little people at her feet to realize the gravity of the situation they were in.

And she didn't want her fun to end any time soon.

"Ok, let's see," she mused, looking down at the crowd from her lofty perspective. "Which one of you do I play with first? How about...you!"

A random man was plucked from the crowd without warning or reason, facing down the giant Meister as she looked on, eyeing his figure.

"You look pretty strong. Do you work out?"

"Y...yes," the man replied. It was true, he did go to the gym often, and weightlifting was a hobby of his.

"Do you think you're stronger than me?" Nena asked, her last word spoken with a slight grit of her teeth. Seeing the man fumble for a response, she added "I think my little pinkie is stronger than you! Wanna find out?"

The man couldn't reply before a giant digit pressed onto him. And while he struggled valiantly, the multiple tons of Nena's bodyweight proved too great for him to overcome. In one fell swoop, he was reduced to paste with the others looking on silent, a reaction that the cruel woman did not appreciate.

"No clapping? No cheering? Oh, I get it, you want to see more! Well seeing as I'm such a caring goddess, I'll show you another game! Now, who to play with?"

A few more people, three men and two women, were plucked from the crowd in front of Nena. Curiously, she eyed them, placing them on her index finger, a fragile stool for the group. They had all but ten seconds before she announced her intention.

"The last one to stay on gets a prize. The rest say hi to the ground the hard way."

With that, Nena began violently shaking her finger as two men fell to their deaths, the crowd able to do nothing for fear they might be the next participants in her little games. Those on her finger had little to focus on besides survival, the one man finally having enough and pushing his two "competitors" to their deaths, watching them unceremoniously fall as Nena dropped him into the safety of her hand.

The crowd, remembering what happened before, clapped at the deplorable sight.

"Very good!" Nena announced to the man in his hand. "I think you deserve a prize."

"A prize?" the young man asked shaken, the T-shirt he was wearing drenched in sweat from the emotions that had overcome him.

"Yes, a prize," Nena repeated, bending over and puckering her lips. The man knew what she was going to do, and didn't refuse. It felt odd, but in a good way. Her lips were warm and soft as they explored him. Lost in the moment, he closed his eyes and kissed the goddess back.

GULP!
15521222221111.title: A goddess and her toys

155212222211111.content:
High above in the black reaches of space, a briefing was being held aboard the Ptolemaios.

"Is this some weird joke?" questioned Lockon, as he viewed the curious footage being screened before the assembled Meisters. "I mean, if the intel guys have certain...interests, they really don't need to involve us"
"I wish it were a joke", replied Sumeragi, "but unfortuanetly this isn't some perverted creation of a lonely computer geek. This is a real genuine recording we received 15 minutes ago".
"But that's...", Allelujah trailed off.
"Nena Trinity, Meister of the Gundam Throne Drei", Tieria finished.
"Indeed. Somehow, she's been grown to giant size. Ian suspects we might be seeing a new application of GN Particles"
Lockon chuckled softly "Bet the old man's upset he didn't think of it first".
Setsuna, who had remained silent for most of the briefing, finally spoke up. "What is our strategy?"
Sumeragi briefly looked away, a look of uncomfort on her face. "I'm glad you asked. A unique crisis obviously calls for a unique strategy. In contrast to most of our previous armed interventions, we specifically know our target. Who she is, how she acts....what she wants..". Sumeragi's gaze turned fully towards the boy. "Setsuna, you are a critical part of the mission plan. From our past encounter with Throne Meisters, we know that Nena has an...affection for you. That fact is our greatest hope of safely resolving this matter. I want you to head for the target zone in Exia and bait her out of the city. Lead her to an open space where yourself and the other Meisters can then safely act as needed. I apolagise for this and the poor intel, but it's the best I can offer at this time. Do your accept your mission?
155212222211111.title: Short notice strategy

choices: He's able to get his attack off without being spotted
Nena sees Exia, and remembers who's inside
1552122222111111.content:
"Me?" Setsuna asked, seemingly unsure of how to answer the request of his superiors. He was not one to refuse an order, but something about that girl was just plain...creepy.

"Yes, you" Sumeragi answered. "Your relationship to the target gives us the best possibility of neutralizing the threat."

"Wouldn't Dynames or Virtue be more suited to this mission with their long range weapons?" Setsuna suggested. It was his best chance of getting out of this mission without being insubordinate or revealing himself to be scared of what was essentially a giant fangirl.

Unfortunately, Sumeragi shook her head at the suggestion. "Long range bombardment unfortunately carries with it the risk of putting civilians in danger. Even if the target was silenced in one shot, we would face the very dangerous possibility of her falling onto the entrapped civilians and killing a mass amount. In order to reduce civilian casualties, we need to engage the target up close, hence, the choice of Exia."

Setsuna was out of excuses. But he still didn't want to commit to this."

"Heh, what's wrong?" Tiera, who had remained silent until this moment, finally asked. "Is the embodiment of Gundam himself scared of a mission?" As was common for a comment from Tieria, it cut to the core of Setsuna.

"Mission accepted."

"Well, there's no need to be so formal," Sumeragi answered, but if that's the case, then off you go.

Sestuna ran towards the hangar bay, with only one sentence left behind.

"I will silence the target."
1552122222111111.title: Shoehorned

choices: Exia's GN particles cause Nena to grow larger
Nena remains at her current size and pursues Exia
15521222221111112.content:
Setsuna donned his normal suit and prepped his Gundam for launch. "Nena Trinity..." he thought to himself. One of the mysterious yet wreckless Throne Meisters...an enemy. A distortion....he would destroy the distortion.
"Exia, you are clear for launch!" Christina's cheery voice sang over the comm. "Roger", Setsuna responded, "GN-001 Gundam Exia, launching!". The launch catapult quickly flung the mobile suit into the black veil of space, where it continued towards Earth's atmosphere and its target...

Back in the city, Nena had become frustrated. "Bored, bored, BORED!" wailed the giant girl, stomping her feet with every word (and killing several people with every stomp). "You worms are so pathetic! Can't anyone offer me a challenge?". Over the last hour or so she had played any number of sick games with the tiny residents, testing her limits and flaunting her power. She'd known it would be the case anyway, but they were so fragile. None could hold up to her majesty. Those who remained alive cowered in fear, too afraid to run unless they became a target. "You better get used to this, you trash!". She shot a grin before continuing; "Now that I'm large and in charge, you all belong to ME!". She slowly stomped forward with an exagerated stride, intentionally accenting her sheer size. The tiny people trembled as they were once again reminded of the sheer unchallenged power this girl held over them. "No one's even tried to rescue you. Your government has abandoned you. You're beyond hope now. You live under my law now and what I say goes!!"

As if in response to this decleration, something struck Nena in the back of the neck. "OW!!" she cried, spinning around to locate whatever had attacked her. "Who the fuck was that?! Show yourself, you bastard!!". Her attacker had no intention of hiding. Hovering in the air stood the Gundam Exia, it's right arm still raised after firing a beam shot. "Setsuna F Seiei has intercepted the target. Will proceed with the intervention.

"A GUNDAM?!", Nena snarled, "You dare challenge me? You're a wreckless bastard to be sure-". She paused. A wreckless Gundam Meister? That sounded like...she looked again. It was! Gundam Exia. Her anger disipated, replaced with a delighted grin. "Ooooh, so it's you! The wreckless Meister that turns me on. Did you come to worship your goddess?". She raised a monolithic hand, moving it towards the Gundam. Setsuna's response was swift.Unfurling the GN Sword he struck at her palm before diving out of the way.
"OW!!" the giantess cried again, snatching back her hand on reflex. The wound was not unlike a paper cut. "Heh, so you wanna play hard to get, cutie? I'm game..."
15521222221111112.title: Her little toy boy

choices: Nena removes Setsuna from Exia to play with him
She keeps him inside and plays with him there
155212222211111121.content:
Setsuna was focused on nothing but the mission at the moment, speaking only in mission statements and responses to his commander. In sharp contrast was the gigantic Nena, with Exia resembling a large figurine in comparison to her, squealing with delight even as she was attacked.

"Come over here little cutie," she cooed, "I promise this won't hurt...too much!"

That dreadful feeling took hold of Setsuna again. It occurred every time he was near the girl, and he couldn't explain it. Was the feeling fear? Disgust? God forbid, an attraction caused by said disgust? What mattered was that it was interfering with the...

A furious rattling shook Setsuna from his thoughts as he noticed Nena's hand clasping around his Gundam. But that was...her hand wasn't that big.

"Wait a sec," Nena pondered as Exia quickly flew off. "Is that getting smaller?" She was so preoccupied with the question that she didn't notice Exia coming in close for another strike. However, as it approached, she did notice Exia visibly shrinking in front of her, along with the rest of the surroundings. The realization of what this meant caused her to grin in delight.

"Exia's making me bigger! Oh you little cutie!" she exclaimed as she reached out with stretched arms to embrace the shrinking (to her) mobile suit. "Come here! I want to thank you!"

Setsuna could only stare. The GN particles were most likely the cause for this, but other than full retreat, what could he do? Still, remaining was a problem, since every second waited was only empowering the Throne Meister.

Quickly, Setsuna flew at a series of odd angles in an attempt to confuse the giantess, readying his sword for one killing stroke. He was prepared to strike, but unfortunately for him, he failed to make one calculation. Nena's size allowed her to sweep him and Exia up before he could get within striking distance, as the still growing girl embraced the mobile suit, kissing it and cooing at the Meister inside.

"Thank you so much for this power!" a delighted Nena got off between kisses. "We are going to have so much fun together!"

Setsuna looked up at his monitors, the cameras drenched with the saliva of the giantess' kisses, as he realized what that feeling was. Dread. Unmistakable, bone chilling dread at what she wanted to do with him.
155212222211111121.title: Odd feelings

choices: Nena has her way with her 'toy boy'
Someone interrupts the goddess at play
1552122222111111211.content:
Oblivious to the emotional state of the meister within, Nena Trinity continued to rain down kisses upon the ever shrinking (to her) Gundam Exia; by now the once mighty 60 foot machine of destruction could safely fit on the palm of the self-proclaimed goddess' hand.
said goddess was swiftly getting bored of simply kissing the metal avatar of death within her grasp; she wanted to thank the krugis youth properly, and to do that she would have to 'extract' him.

The ideas that came from the notion of 'properly thanking' the object of her desires brought a wicked and lustful leer to the face of the red-headed, amber eyed Throne Drei pilot.

The expression that came to Nena Trinity's face did not go unnoticed by said object of desires, one Setsuna F. Seiei, whose dread was only amplified by the expression upon her otherwise beautiful visage. What she did next however, nearly made him faint out of sheer terror:

"Setsuna, don't you wanna come out and play?" the former pilot of Throne Drei purred lustily.
When the machine within her hand began to struggle, she only tightened her grip "if you do, I'll give you a [i]special prize[/i] the female meister added sultrily, rubbing her groin lewdly all the while.

Not noticing the accompanying action,the crowd that had dispersed into the surrounding buildings seeking some medium of shelter shuddered sympathetically. They all remembered the fate that the last 'prizewinner' had suffered and the horrific bulge that had appeared in the crimson haired throat of their 'goddess' as her powerful esophageal muscles dragged him to his fate; a new layer of fat within the titanic bosom of the still growing Trinity sibling was most likely all that remained of him now.

Hearing her words of desire for him made Setsuna begin to feel physically sick, an entirely foreign feeling to the seventeen-year-old Gundam pilot. , Nena Trinity, pilot and self-proclaimed goddess, finally began to tear away the armor that was the sole barrier between her and the boy she lusted after.
1552122222111111211.title: Nena's 'doll'

choices: Exia manages to team up with Dynames
Nena focuses on revenge against Dynames
15521222221111112112.content:
The GN enriched armour that Exia was constructed from offered proud resistance but Nena knew it was only a matter of time before she got what she wanted. "I love candy", she purred, "Hard outer shell with a soft centre!". Setsuna tried to ignore the mind games, working in vain to escape the girl's vice like grip.

"Stop fidgeting, it's tickling me", Nena giggled. In truth, it was the last thing she wanted. As much as she hated not getting her way, the futile struggles of a victim only added to her pleasure. The powerless reminder that she held complete absolute control...And now that control was truely absolute, control over a fragile, miniature world not built to withstand her pure, magnificance-

For the second time that day, Nena was cut off by a shot to the back. Her increased scale made it less painful but her reaction was no less withdrawn: "WHAT THE FUCK IS IT WITH PEOPLE TODAY?!". She spun around (levelling several buildings and snuffing out many lives) to face down a second familiar attacker. "Dynames..." she snarled.

"Damage minimal, damage minimal! Target too big!", Haro chirped. "You can say that again" replied Lockon, his monitors filled with a mass of white surface. "Setsuna's got himself into one hell of a pickle...let's see what we can do about that!"

Dynames swiftly began swooping across the effective super structure that was the gigantic Nena, an unpredictable flight pattern that was peppered with pistol shots. The shots were like insect bites to the enraged giantess. "WHO THE HELL INVITED YOU?!" she roared, launching her free hand in an attempt to grab the green Gundam. Were it not for Haro the sniper unit would not have moved in time, missing by inches and swooping over the gigantic palm. Not thinking, Nena relaxed her other hand and threw it across her chest in a second attempt. The miss was even closer this time, clipping off the bottom of one Dynames shield panels. Nena growled from the depths of her throat, a terrifying sound. Her anger only increased further when she realised she'd released the other hand...which meant....

Her eyes swiftly fell upon the damaged Exia, trying desperately to form up with Dynames. "NO!"
15521222221111112112.title: Someone interrupts the goddess at play

info.brief_description: Mobile suits are no longer the most dangerous thing...now it's the women
info.description:
For a long time, Gundam has been ignored by the anime GTS community. This story aims to correct that. This story will focus on as many of the various series as possible, to ensure everyone is satisfied.

Basic rules-

Nothing gross- no toilet, insertion, etc. Vore and crushing are allowed.

Stay in character- if you're going to make a good character evil, create a valid in story reason for this behaviour. Most Gundam females are peace loving, so to have them suddenly wanting to kill people for fun is a great stretch.

Be respectful- Different people have different tastes. Do not hijack a thread to focus on your interests alone.

No crossovers- keep this to Gundam only.

With that out of the way, have fun!
